rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
The segment describes culling using neutral language ('quarantined', 'depopulated').
This segment triggers Q5 (Reassuring) due to containment statement ("will not enter the food system"), skipping Q3.
States 'Birds from the flock will not enter the food system', which is a bare negation from an official source, not an explicit calming cue.
Segment does not contain a minimiser + scale contrast.
